Objects.Name: Rusty Key
Objects.Description: A rusty key is here, getting rustier by the minute.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A rusty key is here.  It has a fish engraved upon it, and looks like itmight fit on a keyring.

Objects.Name: Shining Silver Key
Objects.Description: A shining silver key is here, glinting merrily.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A silver key is here, engraved with a heron - the ensignia of the highesthouse of Haven.

Objects.Name: large key
Objects.Description: A large key is lying here, as big as your hand.

Objects.Name: sea chest
Objects.Description: A heavy sea chest is here, against the wall.

Objects.Name: twinkling ruby
Objects.Description: A ruby is lying here, twinkling suggestively.

Objects.Name: twinkling ruby
Objects.Description: A ruby is lying here, twinkling suggestively.

Objects.Name: candle
Objects.Description: A candle is here, sputtering almost to the point of going out.

Objects.Name: banks hidden
Objects.Description: .This is a hidden object. The long description can only be seen with holylight. If you see this as a mortal please report the bug.

Objects.Name: padded couch
Objects.Description: A padded couch is lying here, looking shabby.

Objects.Name: silver ring
Objects.Description: A silver hoop of metal is here in the dust.

Objects.Name: black leather boots
Objects.ShortDescription: a pair of black leather boots
Objects.Description: A pair of worn, black leather boots is lying here on the ground.

Objects.Name: silver helm
Objects.Description: A sparkling helm of silver is here on the ground.

Objects.Name: wooden spoon
Objects.Description: A wooden spoon is here, looking very mundane.

Objects.Name: demonic idol
Objects.Description: A demonic idol is here, crudely made.

Objects.Name: stag carving
Objects.Description: A small carving of a stag is here, so masterfully done it looks almost alive.

Objects.Name: chair
Objects.Description: A wooden chair is here, ready to be sat upon.

Objects.Name: diamond brooch
Objects.Description: A brooch is here, sparkling with diamonds.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Hey...  These diamonds look rather fake...

Objects.Name: pixie-eye emerald
Objects.Description: An emerald about the size of a pixie's eye is here.

Objects.Name: bejeweled bracelet
Objects.Description: A bracelet is lying here, sparkling with jewels.

Objects.Name: fish
Objects.Description: A fish is lying here, smelling fishy.

Objects.Name: brown bottle beer
Objects.Description: Its a brown bottle.  It might even have beer in it.

Objects.Name: pitcher water
Objects.Description: A pitcher has been placed here carefully, full of clear water.

Objects.Name: twisted staff
Objects.Description: A twisted quarterstaff is here, looking rather harmless.

Objects.Name: barbed spear
Objects.Description: A dangerous barbed spear is here, looking nasty.

Objects.Name: awl pike
Objects.Description: An awl pike is here, taking up much space.

Objects.Name: jeweled dagger
Objects.Description: A dagger is lying here, its jewels sparkling merrily.

Objects.Name: curving dagger
Objects.Description: A dagger lies here on the ground, its curve looking particularly wicked.

Objects.Name: chain
Objects.Description: A lenght of chain is lying on the ground, gleaming.

Objects.Name: large flail
Objects.Description: A large flail is lying here, looking abandoned.

Objects.Name: bench
Objects.Description: A bench has been provided for weary travelers to rest upon.

Objects.Name: aquamarine chalice
Objects.Description: An aquamarien chalice has been abandoned here.

Objects.Name: purple decanter
Objects.Description: A purple decanter is here.

Objects.Name: glowing apple
Objects.Description: A glowing red apple is here.

Objects.Name: yellow jar
Objects.Description: A yellow jar is here, humming with power.

Objects.Name: rose shaped vial
Objects.Description: A rose-shaped vial is lying here, glowing slightly.

Objects.Name: green vial
Objects.Description: A green vial is here, glowing slightly.

Objects.Name: wooden toy
Objects.Description: A wooden child's toy is lying here, forgotten.

Objects.Name: market stall
Objects.Description: A market stall is here, the vendors inside yelling for customers.

Objects.Name: dining table
Objects.Description: A dining table is setting in the middle of the floor here, heaped with food.

Objects.Name: big soft pillow
Objects.Description: A big pillow is here, looking very soft and inviting.

Objects.Name: mat
Objects.Description: A mat is lying on the floor here.

Objects.Name: bread
Objects.Description: A loaf of freshly baked bread is here.  It looks yummy.

Objects.Name: bed
Objects.Description: The magnificent bed of Degruziel lies here on the center of the floor.

Objects.Name: key
Objects.Description: A small key has been left lying here.  Maybe someone has lost it.

Objects.Name: chainmail coif
Objects.Description: A small pile of chainmail lies here on the ground.

Objects.Name: lute
Objects.Description: A lute is lying here, abandoned by its owner.

Objects.Name: steel longsword
Objects.Description: A steel longsword is here on the ground, neglected.

Objects.Name: old leather dog collar
Objects.Description: Some dog somewhere has lost it's old collar.

Objects.Name: rat tail
Objects.Description: A long, dirty rat's tail is here on the ground.  What pollution.

Objects.Name: silver pitcher wine
Objects.Description: A silver pitcher is on the ground here.

Objects.Name: serving platter
Objects.Description: A large platter made of silver and with an odd handle is on the ground here.

Objects.Name: tri-cornered hat
Objects.Description: A hat with three corners is lying here.

Objects.Name: shimmering silvery dress
Objects.Description: A pile of shimmering material is lying here.  Perhaps it might be a dress.

Objects.Name: rich cape
Objects.Description: A rich cape made of silver thread is here, looking expensive.

Objects.Name: banded steel leg guard
Objects.Description: A pair of banded steel leg guards are sitting here, looking rather new.

Objects.Name: banded steel bracer
Objects.Description: A piece of banded steel is just lying here.

Objects.Name: steel shortsword
Objects.Description: A steel shortsword is on the ground here.  Pity.  It might rust.

Objects.Name: black silk skirt
Objects.Description: Somebody has left a skirt here.

Objects.Name: moustache
Objects.Description: A small, fuzzy thing is on the ground here.  What the... It looks like a fake moustache.

Objects.Name: peg leg
Objects.Description: A false peg leg is here, lying in the open.

Objects.Name: rusty cup water
Objects.Description: A rusty cup is lying here, collecting rainwater.

Objects.Name: curving sword
Objects.Description: A short, curving sword is lying here glimmering.

Objects.Name: curving dagger
Objects.Description: A strange curved dagger is here.

Objects.Name: black silk pants
Objects.ShortDescription: a pair of black silk pants
Objects.Description: Someone has lost their pants.... hmm....

Objects.Name: black silk shirt
Objects.Description: A black silk shirt is lying here, neglected.

Objects.Name: rags
Objects.Description: A pile of smelly rags is here, stinking.

Objects.Name: purse
Objects.Description: A woman must have dropped her purse here...

Objects.Name: red dress
Objects.Description: A pile of red material lies abandoned here, looking vaguely like a dress.

Objects.Name: cutlass
Objects.Description: A cutlass is here, gleaming sharply.

Objects.Name: net
Objects.Description: A tangled rope net is lying here.

Objects.Name: herring
Objects.Description: A raw fish is here... it might just be a herring.

Objects.Name: broken bottle
Objects.Description: A half-shattered broken bottle has been left here.

Objects.Name: wine glass wine
Objects.Description: A wine glass lies here, discarded.

Objects.Name: patched dress
Objects.Description: A shabby dress is here, sewn with colorful patches.

Objects.Name: ale flagon ale
Objects.Description: A flagon of ale lying is here, forgotten.

Objects.Name: handcart
Objects.Description: A wooden handcart is lying here, tipped on its side.

Objects.Name: silver bracelet
Objects.Description: A ring of silver metal is here, waiting to be worn on a wrist.

Objects.Name: transparent veil
Objects.Description: A small pile of sheer material is here, looking like a veil.

Objects.Name: wool skirty
Objects.Description: A pile of wool is here, vaguely looking like a skirt.

Objects.Name: black leather mask
Objects.Description: A black leather mask lies here, ready to conceal someone's face.

Objects.Name: barbed whip
Objects.Description: A barbed whip is here, looking malicious.

Objects.Name: wooden spoon
Objects.Description: A wooden spoon is lying here, looking abandoned.

Objects.Name: sparkling chainmail
Objects.Description: A pile of chain links is here, sparkling in the light.

Objects.Name: black bandana
Objects.Description: A strip of black cloth is on the ground here.

Objects.Name: bullwhip
Objects.Description: A bullwhip is here, looking menacing.

Objects.Name: saddlebag
Objects.Description: A saddlebag is lying here, abandoned.

Objects.Name: sparkling mace
Objects.Description: A sparkling silver, but heavy-looking, mace is lying here unattended
Objects.ExtraDescription: This mace looks pretty fancy, but if used right it might be able to inflictsome damage...

Objects.Name: merchant's sword
Objects.Description: A shimmering sword is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The sword is well-crafted and also looks expensive.  It has the mark of amaster swordsman on the side.

Objects.Name: commoner's sword
Objects.Description: An unusually common looking sword is here, gleaming slightly.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The sword looks like the generic sword, except for the blue silk wrappedaround the hilt signifying loyalty to the diety of the sea.

Objects.Name: bracer
Objects.Description: A black leather bracer is lying here, looking special.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The bracer is made of top-quality black leather and seems to glow a bit.

Objects.Name: guard vest
Objects.Description: A pile of black leather is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The vest, judging by the make and material, was crafted by hand and madewell.  It is of black leather and looks comfortable.

Objects.Name: whittling knife
Objects.Description: A whittling knife is lying here.  It looks sharp.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This whittling knife looks as though it has been used a lot, but it is stillvery sharp.

Objects.Name: gullmarked sword
Objects.Description: A sword with a stylized gull engraved onto the hilt is here, looking special.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The stylized gull form on the sword is the special mark of Haven's besttrained, their elite guardsmen.  Not many in the realm can boast their skillwith their swords.
